overview: Video magazine with interviews and video clips. Featured on this volume is: Scorpions, Exodus, Steve Vai (Whitesnake), Femme Fatale, Vixen, White Lion, Britny Fox, Helloween, Bay Area Special, Nuclear Assault, Tony Iommi (Black Sabbath), Rob Halford (Judas Priest), Kingdom Come, Ozzy Osbourne, Gwar, Lemmy (Mot√∂rhead).
title: Hard 'N Heavy Volume 2
